arabic.classDescription: A course to teach the Arabic language. The class level depends on your level and your desired outcome.

quran.classDescription: A course to teach the Quran. The class level depends on your level and your desired outcome.

pre-algebra.classDescription: An introductory course to algebra covering basic concepts.
pre-algebra.bestFor: Students who are just beginning their algebra journey.

algebra.classDescription: A comprehensive algebra course covering various topics from equations to inequalities.
algebra.bestFor: Students who have basic knowledge of algebra and want to deepen their understanding.

geometry.classDescription: This course covers fundamental geometric principles including shapes, angles, and theorems.
geometry.bestFor: Students interested in geometry and its real-world applications.

pre-calculus.classDescription: This course prepares students for calculus, covering advanced algebra, functions, and trigonometry.

chemistry.classDescription: A foundational course covering key concepts in chemistry including the periodic table, chemical reactions, and bonding.
chemistry.bestFor: Students interested in the fundamentals of chemistry.

physics.classDescription: A comprehensive physics course exploring the laws of motion, energy, and the physical world.
physics.bestFor: Students curious about how the universe works.

web-development.classDescription: Learn the basics of building websites, covering HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
web-development.bestFor: Students interested in creating their own websites.

data-structures-algorithms.classDescription: A course that dives into the organization of data and the algorithms used to process them.
data-structures-algorithms.bestFor: Students aiming to enhance their problem-solving skills in computer science.

oop.classDescription: An introductory course to object-oriented programming concepts, focusing on classes, objects, and design patterns.
oop.bestFor: Students with basic programming skills looking to learn OOP.

databases.classDescription: This course covers the fundamentals of database systems, including SQL and relational databases.
databases.bestFor: Students interested in managing and organizing data.

introduction-to-programming.bestFor: All levels, from beginner in coding, to advanced levels to create complex software.
